pr_title: Don't automatically push docs in release since not allowed by branch …

timeline.message: Don't automatically push docs in release since not allowed by branch protection.

timeline.bodyText: are we missing the pushing of the tag to the main branch in here somewhere?
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: ./gradlew final will push it as part of the nebula release plugin. But fixed a mistake in my README :)
replies.author: anuraaga
